metadata.description: Japan Visa Assistance through VFS Japan

primary_requirements.name: Wet signed Application Form
primary_requirements.description: Will be provided by JV-B Travel and Tours. If applying for Multiple Entry Visa, accomplish the Multiple Entry Request Form

primary_requirements.name: VALID PHILIPPINE PASSPORT
primary_requirements.description: At least 6 months validity. Make sure page 3 is signed

primary_requirements.name: 2 COPIES PSA AUTHORIZATION LETTER
primary_requirements.description: Will be provided by JV-B Travel and Tours

primary_requirements.name: 2 COPIES AUTHORIZATION LETTER
primary_requirements.description: Will be provided by JV-B Travel and Tours

primary_requirements.name: OLD PASSPORT/S WITH USED JAPAN VISA
primary_requirements.description: If applicable. If old passport is not available, provide Explanation Letter

primary_requirements.name: 2 pcs colored Photo (4.5cm x 3.5cm)
primary_requirements.description: White background, taken within 6 months on date of application. Must be formal (no smiling), do not wear white shirt/polo shirt (must be colored)

requirements.name: Original Wet Signed Certificate of Employment
requirements.description: Indicate applicant's position, date hired, compensation, office address, HR landline number and email address. Must be issued within 30 calendar days upon submission

requirements.name: Latest Income Tax Return (ITR)
requirements.description: Form 2316 signed by both Employee and Employer. If no ITR, provide notarized Affidavit of No ITR

requirements.name: Photocopy of Valid DTI or SEC Permit
requirements.description: If SEC Permit, include the GIS (General Information Sheet)

requirements.name: Photocopy of Valid Mayor's or Business Permit
Latest Income Tax Return (ITR)
requirements.description: Form 1701 or Form 1702. If no ITR, provide notarized Affidavit

requirements.name: Photocopy of PRC or IBP Card
Original Bank Certificate with OR from Bank
requirements.description: Average Daily Balance must be shown. Must include type of account, opening date, average daily balance and current balance. Must be commercial bank. Must be issued within 30 calendar days upon submission

requirements.name: Original Bank Statement from Bank
requirements.description: Must only be provided if ADB is not shown in Bank Certificate. Must be from past 6 months, demonstrate stable cash flow. Issued within 30 calendar days

requirements.name: Proof of Relationship
requirements.description: PSA Birth Certificate or PSA Marriage Certificate

notes.confidential_marked: ITR forms, Bank Certificates, Bank Statements, Guarantee Letters, Financial documents
notes.primary_only_display: When showing visa package info in modal, only primary_requirements are shown. Conditional groups appear after applicant_status selection
